reviews.review_msg: The best World Lit course I have taken.  Fascinating and fun lectures. It was a Writing Intensive course, but I really really enjoyed the assigned readings and the materials. Dr. Mehri is considerate, kind, very passionate and very fair.  Recommend!

Dr. Mehri is an amazing teacher and I am very happy I took this class. You will not find a more knowledgeable, caring, and genuine teacher anywhere else. Most of the class's grade comes from quizzes, which can be retaken as many times as you want.

Was taught by him for a Muslim Culture class at U of C. Was horrible with our software (d2l) and we literally would submit quizzes by email (??). Seemed nice, but lectures were really poorly explained and formatted, he went so fast and assumed that everyone knew Arabic or was Muslim which wasn't fair. Ended up being very unreasonable w/ final grade

If some students in the class already speak Arabic/Farsi, he speeds up very very fast and leaves behind students with little to no experience in the language. Do your homework, learn your ligatures quick! This class was fun, and Dr. Mehri loves what he does. Really upset this class did not go the way I wanted it to, but he is great.
Amazing and caring prof

super kind prof who does his best for his students to succeed. at first i will admit it was a bit difficult to follow with his explanations but he is very patient and willing to work with you until you understand. his test policies are reasonable and help you get a good grade

He was by far one of my most favorite professors I have met at SFU. I have had him for 3 semesters straight ranging from introductory Arabic classes and Introductory Persian! He loves what he is doing, and clearly shows that through his enthusiasm throughout the lectures. He is a very fair marker, and always makes his classes super fun :)

The best professor of all time. He has complete passion in what he teaches, makes sure all students are engaged in class, provides assistance to the best of his ability both inside and outside of class Approachable, responds to emails within minutes. Clear on how things are graded and gives students multiple opportunities to make up for mistakes.

Dr. Mehri is by far the best prof Ive had. He is very enthusiastic and passionate about what he teaches and he is amazing at teaching! He truly cares about students learning and does everything in his power to ensure everyone understands the lecture. midterm and exams were very fair and relevant to what was discussed in class. Take this class!!!

Rastin is by far THE SWEETEST prof I have ever had! He really cares about his students doing well and does everything in his power to ensure that his students will do well on quizzes. I have never met anyone more passionate about languages than him. A true gem!

Dr. Mehri is an enthusiastic prof and you can tell that he loves what he specializes in. His lectures were informative, enlightening and fun. Assignments and exams were most relevant. He is kind and most patient and always willing to help.

Dr. Mehri is an enthusiastic prof and you can tell that he loves what he specializes in. If you're a heritage Persian speaker, but have little knowledge in reading and writing (which the entire course is based off), you will definitely struggle in this class because he just... doesn't teach. You'll usually get a paragraph to translate and that's it
Attend all the lectures and contribute to the discussions and you'll do well in his class.
Dr. Mehri is an excellent lecturer - listens to and respects everyone; very organized and fair.. Best class I've taken and best professor!

Passionate and knowledgeable prof! Getting an A or higher is easy if you show up, participate, and review your vocab and grammar. He lets you retake quizzes. Attendance is not mandatory but highly recommended and worthwhile, because you're learning a language.
He is the best prof I have ever had, he truly cares about each and every student. Makes you feel so heard and not alone during hard concepts. He truly wants you to do well in his course. TAKE HIM!
Rastin is such a passionate prof! He really wants his students to learn, is open to questions and makes class so much fun and interactive!
Super easy class and nice prof. You decide quiz dates and can retake as many times as you want. Exams, quizzes and assignments are pretty easy

professor Mehri was the best prof I've had at UBC! He took over our class after our original prof was unable to continue teaching the course and although the class changed quite a bit after he took it over, it became so much better! He is so understanding and caring and will repeat anything you ask him too. He is super friendly. 100% Recommend!!!
This was the best language course I have taken; the lectures were amazing and fun. Highly recommend Dr. Mehri.

Easily one of the best professors I have had at SFU. He is super caring, patient, and always makes time for his students. He is very flexible when it comes to office hours and is also very understanding of his students. Highly recommend!

The best prof in any university by far. Makes learning language fun and helpful. Accessible outside class where you can argue your grades in a cafe or literally anywhere. Choose your own exam dates, very little homework and excellent organization. LOVE IT!!!!

Long live Professor Mehri! He's super enthusiastic & really funny. His class is the only class I actually looked forward to attending (serious). He creates a very fun & educational environment. zende bad ostad

Rastin is definitely the best professor at the university. Hes caring, nice, and engages his students to learn. Rastin used a unique teaching technique and he makes sure his students understand the subjects clearly. He deserves a Nobel Prize.

Really great guy and enthusiastic about the subject, however all of the classes were very unorganized and hard to follow. Not very clear about what vocab will be on the quizzes and a lot of vocab we've never heard on the exercises etc. Easy grader though.

I took ARAB 134 without knowing what to expect. It was easily one of the best classes I have ever taken, thanks to Rastin. You will learn so much about classical Arabic and a little bit of history. Rastin is a really encouraging prof. He is always happy to help his students during office hours, and he is easy to talk to. His marking is fair too!
Perhaps one of the best classes I had taken - Dr Mehri is most attentive and most fair. Lectures are fun and informative.
Fascinating and fun course, and kind compassionate prof.
Awesome prof
Marvellous course, and a great prof!

Rastin is a great prof and is always available for students. He is very enthusiastic when he teaches which makes for a great classroom environment. If he does go through lessons fast, remind him to slow down (he doesn't mind) :)

Arabic is hard, so kudos to Rastin for breaking it down. Focus is mainly on classical writing, so do not expect to learn conversational Arabic. Rastin is very supportive! I have some friends who grew up in Arab countries though, and they said that several things taught in the course have grammatical errors. But idk its not my native language.

Very enthusiastic about the course material and always adds references from other languages, so you can make connections. Very intellectual and will help you if you let him. He's also a very easy marker.
so far one of the best classes i have had

Absolutely the best Professor I have ever had, and most definitely ever will have. He has an extreme amount of passion and enthusiasm for teaching and it really helps to have a prof who is so passionate in what they do and who inspires the students. He is an extremely positive and supportive prof.

I'm currently taking this class with Rasti and we're only half way through the term and all I can say is he is an amazing, caring, and funny professor. He makes the time to meet you for your needs, helps, questions outside of class time. He doesn't just want you to learn... but to excel! YOU WILL NOT REGRET HAVING DR. MEHRI AS A PROF!
I believe Dr Mehri to be the kindest and most attentive prof at SFU; very knowledgeable too. Lectures, no matter how dry they are, are made interesting and relevant.
Hands down the best prof in SFU!
absolutely fantastic prof! very caring, kind and fair; lectures are most fun and informative.

dr. Mehri is of the greatest prof I've met in this university. Very welcoming and well-prepared lecture makes content easy to understand. The difficulty for the exams are medium. Also, he is pretty responsible that he shows up for every of his office hour and extend office hour if there's exams. I will definitely take courses with him again.

By far the best professor I've had in my 2 years at SFU. He is always there to help, and will reply to emails within 4 hours after sending them. His teaching methods always make the class interesting and relevant. Highly recommend!
So GREAT! So HELPFUL! Always provided lots of feedback. Very easy to approach!
Wonderful Professor and excellent lectures!
